text: Hottenbaugh Run is a tributary of Neshannock Creek in western Pennsylvania. The stream rises in east-central Lawrence County and flows south then west entering Neshannock Creek at Painter Hill. The watershed is roughly 53% agricultural, 40% forested and the rest is other uses. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Beaver River Category:Rivers of Lawrence County, Pennsylvania
title: Hottenbaugh Run
